Open BCAT Save Directory: 打开 BCAT 数据文件夹
Open the directory which contains Applic: 打开 BCAT 数据文件夹
打开游戏 Mod 文件夹
Open Atmosphere Mods Directory: 打开大气层 Mod 文件夹
Open the alternative SD card atmosphere: 打开大气层 Mod 文件夹
Trigger PPTC to rebuild at boot time on: 使游戏在下次启动时重建 PPTC 缓存
Open PPTC Directory: 打开 PPTC 缓存文件夹
Open the directory which contains the Ap: 打开 PPTC 缓存文件夹
Open Shader Cache Directory: 打开着色器缓存文件夹
Open the directory which contains the Ap: 打开着色器缓存文件夹
